xxl.core.indexStructures
Class XTree.Node.SplitInfo

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node.SplitInfo
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.Node.SplitInfo

              xxl.core.indexStructures.XTree.Node.SplitInfo
Enclosing class:
XTree.Node
public class XTree.Node.SplitInfo
extends RTree.Node.SplitInfo

SplitInfo contains information about a split. The enclosing Object of this SplitInfo-Object (i.e. Node.this) is the new node that was created by the split.

          Flag indicating if the split succeeded.
